original_text: So I took hold of the two tablets and threw them out of my two hands and broke them before your eyes.
korean_text: 내가 그 두 돌판을 내 두 손으로 들어 던져 너희의 목전에서 깨뜨렸노라

sentences.original_text: So I took hold of the two tablets
and threw them out of my two hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 내 두 손에서 던졌다

sentences.original_text: and broke them before your eyes.
